scripts.build_global: rm -rf dist/global && mkdir dist/global && browserify src/RxNext.global.js --outfile dist/global/RxNext.js
scripts.build_es6: rm -rf dist/es6 && tsc src/RxNext.ts --outDir dist/es6 --target ES6 -d
scripts.build_cjs: rm -rf dist/cjs && babel dist/es6 --out-dir dist/cjs --modules common --sourceMaps --loose all
scripts.build_amd: rm -rf dist/amd && babel dist/es6 --out-dir dist/amd --modules amd --sourceMaps --loose all
scripts.build_test: rm -rf dist/ && npm run build_es6 && npm run build_cjs && jasmine
scripts.build_all: npm run build_es6 && npm run build_amd && npm run build_cjs && npm run build_global
scripts.build_perf: npm run build_es6 && npm run build_cjs && npm run perf
